text: Hi all, I was wondering if anyone had a nifty way of waiting for a HubSpot form to load before before calling a specific function. We are trying to target a HS field in an autogenerated form? Also, it appears that hs clears out all fields after they have initially been filled after a few seconds- as if the form is beingre-loaded. Anyone seen that?
